explains: n. 蜜蜂；<美>聚会，联谊赛；工作忙碌的人（busy bee）
wordGroup: queen bee 蜂王；社交界女王
busy as a bee 像蜜蜂一样忙碌，忙得不可开交
bumble bee 大黄蜂，熊蜂；桁洩网渔船

sentences.en: The flower opens to reveal a bee.
sentences.cn: 花开了，露出来一只蜜蜂。

sentences.en: A wasp or bee sting is painful but not necessarily serious.
sentences.cn: 被黄蜂或蜜蜂蜇一下疼是疼，但未必碍事。

sentences.en: Her arm was beginning to swell up where the bee had stung her.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊给蜜蜂蜇了，肿了起来。
